sentences.en: And I'll be waiting for my friend, Dong Li , a freshman.
sentences.cn: 我要等我一年级的朋友 董力.

sentences.en: Being a freshman there was the academic equivalent of boot camp.
sentences.cn: 在那里上大学一年级就等于是进了新兵训练营.

sentences.en: He flounders through the first weeks of freshman year.
sentences.cn: 刚进大学的头几个星期他手足无措.

sentences.en: He is a freshman in the show business.
sentences.cn: 他在演艺界是一名新手.

sentences.en: I've been a freshman in college for a couple weeks.
sentences.cn: 我一直几周大学一年级学生.

sentences.en: It is quite unusual for a freshman to be younger than eighteen or older than nineteen.
sentences.cn: 一年级新生小于十八岁或大于十九岁是相当特殊的.

sentences.en: It's important for the college freshman to keep his nose clean.
sentences.cn: 对大学新生而言洁身自好是很重要的.

sentences.en: Jack decided to live in during his freshman year at college.
Mary is in her freshman year.
Matty's girlfriend, Sandy, is a freshman at Maryland.
sentences.cn: 麦蒂的女朋友, 桑迪, 是马里兰大学的大一新生.

sentences.en: Mike is a university freshman. He is talking to Patty, an upperclassman.
sentences.cn: 迈克是大一新生. 他和他师姐帕蒂在说话.

sentences.en: Tese areas were not normally frequented by geologists and were unheard of at the freshman level.
sentences.cn: 这是些不仅初学者们前所未闻,就是地质学家通常也很少涉猎的领域.

sentences.en: This freshman - level course is an introduction to classical mechanics.
sentences.cn: 这门课程针对大学新生开设,主要介绍经典力学.

words.tran_cn: 新鲜人；大学一年级新生

trans.tran_cn: （中学或大学的）一年级学生，新手
trans.tran_en: a student in the first year of  high school  or university
